title: Stable Diffusion LoRA Training
name: sd-lora-train-task
setup: uv pip install diffusers[torch] transformers accelerate peft bitsandbytes datasets torchvision wandb
description: Fine-tune Stable Diffusion using LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation) via Hugging Face Diffusers and PEFT. Generates a dummy dataset for demonstration if none is provided.
